data.title: Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso Population 2024
data.text: Ouagadougou 's 2024 population is now estimated at 3,358,934. In 1950 , the population of Ouagadougou was 33,035. Ouagadougou has grown by 155,011 in the last year, which represents a 4.84% annual change.These population estimates and projections come from the latest revision of the UN World Urbanization Prospects. These estimates represent the Urban agglomeration of Ouagadougou , which typically includes Ouagadougou 's population in addition to adjacent suburban areas.
